title: ICYMI - Timothy Snyder Discusses "On Tyranny" and How to Maintain a Democracy
itunes:title: ICYMI - Timothy Snyder Discusses "On Tyranny" and How to Maintain a Democracy
description:
Yale history professor and "On Tyranny" author Timothy Snyder weighs in on what the rise of European fascism can teach Americans about preserving democracy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
